name: Chocolate Cake
description: Delicious chocolate cake, light and melting.

instructions.text: Melt the chocolate and butter in a bain-marie.
Separate the egg whites from the yolks. Beat the yolks with the sugar and a little water until the mixture becomes frothy.
Incorporate the flour and baking powder into the egg yolk mixture.
Whisk the egg whites until stiff and gently fold them into the batter.
Pour the batter into a buttered and floured pan, then bake at 180Â°C for about 30 minutes.

tips: Check the baking with the tip of a knife: it should come out dry.
For an even more melting cake, add a tablespoon of crÃ¨me fraÃ®che to the batter.
Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a chocolate sauce for more indulgence.
